response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value and could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be well above $1,000,000 based on its market demand, technological advancements, and potential return on investment. I am offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to acquire a game-changing asset at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your goals and aspirations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
